header.title: Your online booking and delivery platform
header.description: Download now the app for your phone and let us take care of the whole process of reservation and delivery, so you can enjoy more of your outings or relax at home while you're waiting for your order.

reviews.title: What Our Customers are Saying
reviews.text1: Appicar seems to me an excellent tool, we went out to eat among many friends, even people that I did not know and each or each group asked for different things. With this app we were able to know exactly how much each one had to pay, either individually or as a group.
reviews.text2: Appicar solved everything, yesterday I had a crazy day and did not have time for anything, in just a few minutes this app helped me find parking, book a good restaurant and I could even look at the menu (with images of each dish) and prices. Everything quickly, simply and in one application. It is very complete, totally recommended!
reviews.text3: I own a restaurant and thanks to Appicar, we have streamlined our way of working, also joining the technological wave and taking full advantage of the benefits provided by this app. We also noticed that people feel very comfortable and they do everything from the comfort of their cell phone. It should be noted that we also expanded our clientele as we reached a lot more people even showing appetizing images of our dishes.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer you a range of amazing services that will revolutionize your experience as a customer:
services.groupReservations2: so you can enjoy your outings with your family or friends. The bill can be divided individually between the diners or you can pay for all or some of them. You're free to choose!
services.whatUWant: what you want. You won't have to wait no longer for the waiter to come to your table and take your order!
services.cellphone: from your cellphone and you won't have to ask for the bill and wait no longer for the waiter to come and charge you. Available payment methods are:
services.find: You can find your destination by
services.gps: using your cellphone's GPS or you can filter stores by

about-page.title: About Us
about-page.description1: We are a company that thinks about giving the user all the simplicity and comfort possible when choosing and enjoying a good meal in the desired place. We offer you all the tools to organize your departure, from the parking, search, choice and reservation of the place; from a menu with images of each dish to the forms of payment, including an efficient method of exact division of the account between each one of the diners, ideal for group events. Everything very simple and from your cell phone.
about-page.description2: Appicar is an application designed to make life easier for people when it comes to enjoying an outing to eat or drink. But not only we focus on the consumer user but also provide various tools for the benefit of the places where these people will attend, that is, your business.For start we tell you that we have an effective reservation system in which the user can see in real time the tables available or request a place for a certain number of people, this reservation already has the user's data and may have a small cost which will then be automatically reinstated in the final account. Once arrived and located in its place, the user can call the waiter as many times as needed through the app, this will generate a kind of alarm in the local system. Appicar also organizes each order, either group or individual, of each table with their respective costs, which can be settled in different ways and all through our application. We are interested in your business growing hand in hand with Appicar.

team.title: Work Team
team.member1: Appicar's CTO. I.T. Engineer and Full-Stack Developer. Main creator of Appicar's website, web app and mobile app.
